name: Adding an item to an empty list

testSteps.description: Given that James has an empty todo list
When he adds 'Buy some milk' to his list

children.description: James adds a todo item called: Buy some milk

testSteps.description: Then 'Buy some milk' should be recorded in his list

children.description: Then the displayed todo items should be a collection containing 'Buy some milk'

userStory.storyName: Adding new items to the list of things to remember
userStory.narrative:
In order to avoid having to remember things that need doing
As a forgetful person
I want to be able to record what I need to do in a place where I won't forget about them

featureTag.name: Adding new items to the list of things to remember

title: Adding an item to an empty list
